txt.en: Speak with the mission giver to travel to Gaervarad.
'You have done well [placeholder], as agreed, you are deserving of payment. Take this and know that we are grateful for all you have done.'
Return to the mission giver and let him know you have defeated the brigands.
There is no twist in this mission.
Return to Hithriel and tell him the brigands are defeated
Brigands have overrun Gaervarad. You are tasked with defeating every last enemy amongst the ruins.
'Brigands have overrun the ruins of Gaervarad, [placeholder]. We must defeat them!'
Complete the Mission: The Ruins of Gaervarad
Return to Hithriel and tell him the brigands are defeated
